page.title: 02The Middleton Area.
page.content: The area that class 2MW surveyed is mainly made up of pre war 1920's housing.Photo A is a good example of the type of brick built houses that were constructed.Most of the houses are semi-detatched but there are a few town house.All have a front and rear garden and most are owned by Leeds Council although over the last 5 years a number of tenants have bought there own home. There are a number of sites where shops are situated.These shops include grocers,newspaper and fish and chips.One new aspect to Middleton shops is that 4 of them have been taken over by new immigrants from the Far East.The only road of note is the new M62 that runs from Manchester to Hull and cuts across the bottom of our area.The moterway cannot be seen or heard from the majority of the area.
